title: Light It, Shoot It, Retouch It: Lightroom Edition with Scott Kelby
description: We’ve brought back one of Scott’s most iconic classes—with a Lightroom twist! In this brand-new edition of Light It, Shoot It, Retouch It, Scott walks you through an entire portrait session from start to finish. He shows you exactly where he places the light, how he interacts with the model, and how he shoots tethered straight into Lightroom Classic. From there, it’s all about a clean, fast retouch using Lightroom’s latest tools. This class is a behind-the-scenes look at the full workflow, and it’s packed with practical tips to help simplify your own shoots and editing process. Whether you’re new to portraits or just want to streamline your setup, this is one you don’t want to miss. Watch here it today! The post Light It, Shoot It, Retouch It: Lightroom Edition with Scott Kelby appeared first on Lightroom Killer Tips.
author: Kim Doty
excerpt: Join Scott Kelby for an updated take on his classic portrait workflow—from lighting and shooting to tethering and retouching in Lightroom Classic. Watch the full process unfold!
